content.p: The director shall approve for use, and seal or mark with appropriate devices, such weights and measures as he finds upon inspection and test to be correct as defined in , and shall reject and mark or tag as “rejected” such weights and measures as he finds, upon inspection or test, to be incorrect as defined in , but which in his best judgment are susceptible of satisfactory repair: provided, that such sealing or marking shall not be required with respect to such weights and measures as may be exempted therefrom by a regulation of the director issued under the authority of . The director shall condemn, and may seize and destroy, weights and measures found to be incorrect that, in his best judgment, are not susceptible of satisfactory repair. Weights and measures that have been rejected may be confiscated and may be destroyed by the director if not correct as required by , or if used or disposed of contrary to the requirements of .
